name: Lady Comet
description:
This game was made  for MAGICAL GIRL GAME JAM #7. I couldn't do all the things I wanted to do in this time, there were some bugs left, but I did my best, hope you enjoy!

In this game, you are Ana Haley, a girl who received powers to save the city as a Magical Girl.

CONTROLS:

  • MOVE: W,A,S,D.
  • ATTACK MODE: Mouse Right Button
  • SELECT TARGET: Mouse Left Button

Game by Róger Goulart (@roger_goulart)
